title: Ex plat/gold ADC on silver acc.
body:
I have 1 account in gold atm, was plat. Im an adc main but have been having fun playing graves lately. This account is silver 2, just look to push to gold asap. Add me ingame, aslong as you main your role and have decent looking opgg i dont mind. 

Can use voice if all goes well. No toxic, mature only.

Thanks
